description: Christmas is on the way, and you're probably looking for some holiday recipes to make your guests happy. You can't go wrong with an Eggnog White Russian Recipe! This drink combines two classic drinks,&nbsp;Eggnog, and&nbsp;White Russian, into one delicious cocktail!
name: Eggnog White Russian

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the vodka and coffee liqueur in a cocktail shaker and shake for 20 seconds. Pout into the prepared glass with ice, followed by the eggnog.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine the vodka and coffee liqueur in a cocktail shaker and shake for 20 seconds. Pout into the prepared glass with ice, followed by the eggnog.

recipeInstructions.name: Stir and top with the pinch of freshly grated nutmeg and serve.
recipeInstructions.text: Stir and top with the pinch of freshly grated nutmeg and serve.
